participant_1.background:
I am passionate about being crafty and working with my hands.
i like to shop.
I like to stay away from big crowds, so Comic Con isn't my thing.
i am the leader of the french fry research department at del taco.
i do not drink alcohol.

participant_2.background:
My home is my sanctuary, a place where I can relax and be myself.
i really enjoy reading the news.
I lost my job and had to move my family out of our house.
I like to dye my hair a bright shade of red.
I have a date with my girlfriend tonight after a long run.

content.text: I am doing well! I just finished a long run and I am on my way to meet my girlfriend for a date.
That sounds exciting! I hope you have a great time.
Thank you! I am sure we will.
What is your favorite thing to do on a date?
I love to go out to eat, see a movie, or just spend some time together talking and laughing.
Those all sound like great options. What kind of food do you like to eat?
I love trying new foods, but I am always a sucker for a good burger.
Me too! I love a good burger with all the fixings.
What is your favorite kind of burger?
I love a classic cheeseburger with lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles.
That sounds delicious! I am a big fan of bacon on my burger.
I love bacon too! I think I am going to have to go get a burger now.
You should! I am sure it will be delicious.
Thanks for the conversation! I hope you have a great date tonight.
Thank you! I am sure we will
